_source.text: Actress Cynthia Nixon, who came out as gay in 2004 and has a son with her partner Christine Marinoni in addition to two children from the former's previous relationship, told the New York Times  in an interview about her new Broadway play Wit,  she had been subject to a backlash after telling a gay audience: "I've been straight and I've been gay, and gay is better."
